1.content:
Aki was sitting at home, home alone, in her bedroom. Though she looked bored, she was really waiting for somebody, who had promised to come over that evening.

The bell rang, and Aki rushed downstairs, opening the door.

"Hello Lex."

"Hello Aki. Sorry about being a few minutes late, but I had to pick something up from Roxanne."

"What is it?"

"You'll see.....take me upstairs and I'll show you."

So both Lex and Aki climbed the stairs, and Lex sat down near the PS2 she had in her entertainment unit.

"This is the ultimate PS2 hacker's tool." Lex pulled out a large box, which contained a large adapter with several buttons. "It's called The Leveler. Once I snap this on the the broadband port, we can edit just about anything you put in your PS2! From games to movies, anything's possible."

"That's amazing! Show me how it works!"

"Okay...." Lex attached it to the PS2.

"Put a disc in, ANY disc. Or if you'd prefer, you can use the slot on the adapter to insert an N64 game or other cartridge." Lex said.

So Aki did so. Lex turned on the PS2's power and "The Leveler" booted up instantly.

"Here, I can change levels, characters, text, etc....Or on this option if it's an animation, I can draw animation myself with high-tech studio level tools." Lex said.

"What does this button mean?" Aki had just accidently pushed a small blue button labeled "Direct Interaction".

"Huh?" Lex didn't know what that button did. He looked over to check it out. But while he was, he accidently leaned on the left stick on the controller. On the screen, he was making a number go down labeled "Scale". It eventually stopped at 2.

"Oh, I don't know what that is. I think that lets you interact with the game directly. Wanna try it?"

"Sure!" Aki said.

"Okay, start!" Lex said, hitting the X button. He had no idea that he had accidently set the scale to 2 inches, and in a few seconds, they were instantly warped into.....

(Note: I've made a seperate FF section since there are several Final Fantasies. Choice limitations force me to do this.)
1.title: Direct Interaction

111.content:
Lex and Aki are face down, on a gigantic surface.

"Where are we?" Aki asked.

"I don't know." Lex said.

Suddenly, they began to hear a booming sound. It turns out that Aki and Lex are..

1111.content: They were at Malon ranch! To their surprise however it was nighttime. All the horses were stabled and the field hands were probably home. "What should we do?" Lex asked stepping on the green grass. It was so quiet she could only hear the chirping of crickets and her own steps. She turned to Aki and gasped. "Aki! You've turned into an elf!" Aki's eyes were wide as she felt her ears. It was true! They were pointy. "Wait," she said squinting in the dark. "We're still the same height. So that must mean..." Lex touched her ears and saw they were pointy as well. "HOLY COW!" she yelled abruptly. Suddenly a light from a cabin went on. "Who's there?" a man called. Looking toward the stables and back at the house they decided to....
1111.title: At the ranch (Malon)

1251121.content:
Aki and Lex stared in awe at all of their favorite female characters were sitting together so nearby the two of them. It was moments later when they realized that they were smaller then everything else, again. It appears that the girls were having a little get together. Hinata was quiet and shy as she usually is in the show. Tenten is enjoying herself and is having a conversation with Sakura. Lex stars at Sakura, admiring her now real body. He thinks that she is very beautiful and attractive in real life. But what happens next will make Lex even more happier.

Aki pinched herself to see if she was dreaming, but nothing happened, this was real life. She was terrified when she imagined what might happen if they were seen. But Lex was only thinking about the GOOD things that might happen to him if they saw him. So to ease his curiousities he begins to advance towards the giantesses, while Aki is too terrified to notice.

Mom comes in and turns off game.
132.content: they immediatly got shrunk down into the video game. "Awe man! You had to press the button did you?!" said lex. "Well you made us two inches tall!" replied Aki. "One question, what game did you pick?" Aki questioned. "Um, I thought you picked." She answered febly. "I told you to pick!" She argued back. "Who was the last one on the game system?" Lex asked. "My brother!" She exclaimed. "Oh no!" She said. "He was playing an anime war game! I don't know if this thing gives you lives, but I sure don't want to waste mine!" She said shivering. "How will we get home?" lex asked her shivering friend. "You have to go through all the levels." She said. "Ugh. More waste of my time." Lex answered. "I have cheat codes!!" Aki remembered. "Ok, select the button at the top left corner to activate start," Aki said. "Can you reach all the way up there?" She asked. "Almost there! Man. I'm too short. Give me a leg up." She said. Aki made a foothold with her hands, and Lex jumped for it. "Got it!" She said. The game froze. Above, five giant letters were dooming. P-A-U-S-E. The girls were stuck in the jumping position.
132.title: Final Fantasy V

134.content: Who's the gigantic girl they meet?
134.title: Which girl?

choices: They try to get Aeris' attention.
1341.content:
Aki and Lex suddenly fall into an enormous area, with several trees climbing up into the sky. WEre they in a forest?

"Where the HELL are we?" Lex asked. "Is this supposed to happpen?"

"I wouldn't know......." Aki asked.

Suddenly, the ground rumbled. Very loudly. It was almost like an earthquake, but the shaking was at regular intervals. It got louder, and louder, until...

"AAAAH!" Aki screamed as she barely moved out of the way of an enormous foot, nearly crushing her.

"A giant girl?" Lex asked. Suddenly, he noticed the trees weren't trees at all. They were flowers. They were in a flower garden, barely a half an inch tall!

"Oh gosh, we're shrunk!" Aki screamed.
1341.title: Forest? Or garden?

choices: Aki and Lex run from the garden.
They stay put, Aeris will give up eventually.
13411.content:
Lex couldn't believe his eyes as the huge skirt above them swirled with the giant girls movements. Her legs descended down to the soft and smooth bare feet that flank them from either side.

"Please, forgive me tiny bugs, but this garden is my life. I sell these flowers and cannot allow you to eat them. Please understand, I don't want to squish you. I have to," Was a gentle plea that came from the huge girl. Lex and Aki stood in surprise. Obviously this towering flower girl knew she held all the cards, yet she was telling them her story to comfort herself from the dark task she was about to do.

Aeris. It didn't make any sense but that's who she was. One of the girls from the video games. It didn't take Lex long to process it. Games are full of code and conditions. This option for interaction obviously gave the users just as much freedom as the programmers, and their scale was indeed "2" now. Two inches.

Lex scrambled back, slamming into Aki who grabed hold of his arm for support. Both stared upward as the dusty bare sole of Aeris raised up high above them, only a few extra inches to the soft spoken flower girl. Her foot drifted forward, toes arched and ready to touch down so she could quickly dab the ball of her foot down, smushing them quickly.

In blind panic, Aki took off running, Lex shortly following. Aeris moaned in a frusterated tone and began padding after them, but her progress was slow. Lucky for the two shrunken gamers, Aeris was very careful about her garden. Step after step she grew closer, her toes eagerly reaching out, ready to squish one of the two bugs under a giant sized big toe. Aeris had no luck though. She simply couldn't bring herself to stomp around her own garden to take care of them.

Lex rushed over and grabbed Aki, huddling to the dry ground that the flowers somehow had managed to crack through. "She's not going to tear appart her garden to get at us, but if we stay here forever, she'll probably eventually get one of us underfoot. This church is huge though, if we run out of the garden, we'll be on a very wide open plane of wood flooring."

"Well we can't stay here!" Aki shot back, "She won't give up, will she?" Aeris was making her way toward them, another step held high, her foot pivoting as she looked for an opening to step down into.
13411.title: Playing keep away among the flowers

choices: Go for the wall, there has to be cracks in it.
Make a run for the pews, better chance of escape.
134111.content:
"We've got to get out of here!" Lex yelled as he grabbed Aki's hand, leading her through the maze of tall flower stems and huge greens bigger than the size of palm leaves.

Aki tried to pull back in vain, "She'll see us, and then we'll be done for sure out there Lex! What makes you think she won't give up eventually?"

A curious foot prod down behind Aki as she asked that, sending her swirling around to see Aeris' giant step smush the ground beneith her. Sighing Aki began to understand. This garden was this girls life, she wouldn't just give up because she couldn't find them. She would wait them out. What else did she have to do? Did she have anything else to do? Those questions were too vast to stake their lives on.

"Aww, don't go that wau lil' bugs! If my big soft feet catch you out there, it'll hurt a lot to get squished into that hard wood floor!" Aeris teased as she padded over toward them with renewed speed.

Lex gulped, "She wouldn't have given up anyway. I dunno about this, she sure seems to be taking a lot of pleasure in this when she was uncomfortable with it to start with."

"Maybe she enjoys it. She seems sort of alone here in this huge church. We're probably the first living contact she's had all day," Aki remarked as the clump of wooden floorboards sounded under them, followed quickly by the thick thud of Aeris' right foot landing behind them.

Dust swirled around the flower girls mighty toes as her left foot came forward, arching over the last of the flowers to stomp down next to the right. Aki couldn't help but stare back, her eues fixated at first on the giant feet, drinking in the fact that Aeris wanted her under them. Her eyes trailed up to the huge bright eyes high above, Aeris was smiling. It was a game to her.

Lex came to a hault. The wall would provide some cover, making it difficult for Aeris to get a good angle to squish them underfoot. Then again, the church pews would provide great cover and allow them more time to escape. That was, if they could actually reach them before Aeris steps found them.

With a knowing look, he gazed into Aki's eyes.
134111.title: Dash to the hard wood flooring

choices: Aeris loses track of them for now
Aeris finds a way to resume persuit
1341112.content:
"The pews are better. Let's run under them, she'll be slowed down." Aki said.

"You sure?" Lex said, surprised at her sudden taking charge.

She didn't answer. Aeris' foot slammed straight towards Aki, and she dodged with catlike reflexes, and ran straight under the pews. Lex followed, with Aeris literally right behind them. She would occasionally aim a step that would certainly crush both of them at once, but then hesitate for a second so they could escape. She was prolonging it. Her soles slapped against the hard wood floor, causing it to rattle and nearly knock the two of them down. She even kicked a bit at Lex, almost sending him flying.

"These are some extremely quick insects.......but I can get you anytime..." Aeris said with a smile. She was cut short as they barely made it under the pews. Aeris could not follow them there and watched them for a bit. "Smart, too....."

The two of them kept running, while Aeris thought the situation out.
1341112.title: Under the pews

choices: Don't move, it's not worth it, she's lying.
13411122.content:
Lex and Aki didn't have much time to breath a sigh of relief as they turned back and felt their stomachs sink. The delicate and playful flower girl was a lot more ambitious than either of them imagined. To keep the two miniature people from getting away, she actually climbed up on the pews and started climbing over top of them to get to where Lex and Aki had run to.

They looked up horrified as Aeris grinned down from the back of the pew above them. Shortly after she lept over and her huge feet slammed down before them, this time sending enough of a shudder through the wooden floorboards to make them fall over.

Lex struggled to get up and speed away as quicky as possible. Little did he know behind him, Aki was looking up from flat on her back, frozen in fear. Aeris giant toes were arching over her and quickly descended down to trap the tiny girl under the arch of her toes.

"Stop! Keep running and I'll squish your friend!" Aeris announced, the playful tone still in her voice. As much as the command was a threat, this was hardly a serious situation to her.

Aki cried out as Aeris wiggled her toes as she waited. The ball of her foot so close and pressing tiny pebbles to the floor and making them pop into meer grains of sand. She shivered to think of what such a massive sole could do to her own body. She didnt dare move.

"Aww comon, what is it going to be? Are you really going to let my big bare foot finish off your friend? You're out of my garden. The smart thing to do would be to surrender," Aeris suggested, her toes curling more and more, the anticipation of smushing the bug under them was a fun game for her.

Lex gulped deeply. He couldn't abandon his friend. But was this giant flower girl being honest, or would they both just end up as smears on her huge bare feet?
13411122.title: Trapped under Aeris' toes

choices: Yes! And they plan a Rescue!
134111221.content:
You couldnt leave your friend to be crushed under a females giant foot like any other bug. If she said she wouldnt squash you two if you came back then that was your only choice. You walked back and stood in front of the two enormous bare feet of the giant girl sitting at the pew. She released Aki and leaned forward to see you two better.

"Oh so you must be like those other smart bugs that can understand human language. This is good it means I dont have to squish you know as long as you listen to what i say."

Aki and Lex didnt like the sound of this, but at least they didnt end up dead underneath a giant video game characters toes.

"Heres the thing, I have to keep an eye on you 24/7, so you dont eat my flowers and the only thing I can think of is to keep you at my feet. I have a special Materia that wont let you get squished when you're underneath me which means you can stay in my boots as my insoles all day if necessary. It's not so bad, to you it will feel like your being stepped on by a cloud and the only thing you would feel is my skin on your faces and have to deal with the smell a little bit."

The look of horror on Aki and Lex's face was so obvious that even Aeris could make it out. but right at that moment a group of shrunken rebels were walking by Aeris. Did they notice their captive brethren at the mercy of this gigantic brunette?
134111221.title: Forced to Live at a Flower Girls Feet

choices: Only Lex Agrees and Aki Refuses and Tries to Convince Lex to Escape.
Aki and Lex Agree.  For Now
1341112211.content:
The group of shrunken rebels journeyed on, completely unaware of the torture the giant flower girl was inflicting upon her two helpless captives.

The look of horror on Aki and Lex's face was so obvious that even Aeris could make it out and she tried to console them.

"Oh dont worry I'll make sure to take good care of you and feed you and keep you warm but in return for my hospitality all i ask is that you service my feet for me. You know, little stuff like foot massages and keeping them clean."

Aki and Lex were not liking this one bit, but so far the only other option was Death By Giantess!

"Dont look so scared. I'm not forcing you to stay with me. My last pair of insoles couldnt stand the smell of my Feet so I gave them toTifa and Marlene to take care of. I wouldnt dare give them to Yuffie or Elena. That teenaged girl is too wild and Elena is a bit of a control freak."

Aki and Lex were relieved to hear this and were glad they were given a choice in the matter.

"So whats it gonna be little guys? Do you wanna try living at my feet and if you dont like it go to live with my friend? Or am I going to have to squish you right here and now in the garden? I'll Accept your answer in the form of a Foot Massage."
1341112211.title: Aeris Gainsborough and her Two Little Pets

choices: Crush the poor little girl now.
Let her live at least for a while.
134111222.content:
"Just forget about me and save yourself! It's too risky for you to come back!" Aki shouted.

"But if I don't, you might die!" Lex shouted back.

"I'm probably going to die either way.." Aki said.

Lex took off running, trying his best to lose Aeris again while she was distracted.

Aeris got really pissed off. This was a dilemma. She had one ready to get splatted underfoot right now, but she wanted to toy with her. If she stopped for that, she'd lose the other for sure. She wanted both of them slowly squished. So, she could choose to save Aki for later, or quickly splat her now. Either way, she would have to re-persue Lex.
134111222.title: Calling her bluff

1341112221.content: she said time to become a stain little bug. she lower her foot on her. she went pop and stained her foot. she looked at her remains and giggeled at her. she said aww did i squish you hehe
1341112221.title: Crush like  a bug

1341112222.content:
Aeris decided to let her live a while. Lex was balencing the sitution. If anything he wanted a miracle.

"Cross Fire Blade!" Lex looked up in time to see. what to him looked like a giant fire in the shape of a cross get Aeris on the foot. Aeris let out a yelp of pain and fell over. Where Aeris foot was there was someone there with Aki. A man about his age. He was help Aki get up.

"Come on. We can't stay here." the young man said to them. "She's injured."

Lex ran to Aki.

"Are you alright?" he said in concern. Aki smiled and nodded. The young man carryed her in his arms.

"Let's go." they ran toward the wall. Lex was simply following him but he seem trustworthy. Aeris was begin to recover.

"I'm going to get you for that." she said angryly.

"Here, run." he said giving Aki to Lex.

"But what about you?" Aki said. He turned his head and grinned.

"I'll be fine. By the way. My name's Ryan." he turned his head and faced Aeris. He pulled out a sword that was on his back. "Go get against the wall. From there I'll take over."

Lex nodded. And did what he was instructed. Ryan ran toward Aeris and jumped up. He jumped high enough that he was at level with her head. He pointed his sword to the air.

"STOP!" he said. Aeris didn't move. It was a Stop spell. He grinned. "Overdrive!"

He began a seris of slashs then kicked himself away from her. He pointed the blade toward her. "IMPACT!" A large beam shot from his blade. Then Stop spell wore off. Aeris grasped her face and let out a yell of pain. Ryan joined the other two.

"Alright. Let's get out of here." he said.

"How?" Aki asked astonished of his of his abilities. He walked toward the wall and clapped his hands together. He put them against the wall. A flash of light then there was a door. He opened it and it lead outside.

"Like that." he said with a smile. He then reached inside his pocket and pulled out a commuicater. "Falcon. Come in Falcon. This is Major General Ryan."

"Yo. This Falcon. Coordantes just came in. Comin' in from the starboard." said a voice. Ryan walked back to Lex and Aki.

"Can you stand?" he said Aki.

"I think so."she said. Lex put her down. She was able to stand perfectly.

"Good." he said. A ship that probably was not bigger than a model airplane landed. A door from the side open. And there stood another guy. He was dress like Edward Elric from Fullmetal Alchemist. They all walked on board.

"The girl here has an injury." said Ryan.

"Take them to the sick bay." the guy instructed.
1341112222.title: the miracle named Ryan

13411122221.content:
After they got to the medical bay Ryan told Aki to take off her shirt.

"What?" she said.

"You could be suffering from a broken rib or something. Don't worry. I'm expirenced in medical treatment." he said resurringly with a smile. Aki relucntantly did as told. Ryan started from the bottem put a bit of pressure on each rib bone. Aki fought the temptation to slap him.

"Does it hurt here." he said. Aki shook her head. Ryan continued until he reached right below her breasts. Aki yelped in pain.

"Alright. Let's start healing you." he said. He put both hands on the spot and focused.

Lex was staring in another direction. Aki watched in curiosity. His body let out a blue aura. Aki started to feel a lot better. A minute later he said,"There... it's... done."

Then Ryan collasped. Aki put on her shirt.

"*sigh* Ryan always pushes himself to hard. He'll proceed through very well." a voice said. Aki and Lex looked at the entance. There stood the guy from earlier.

"So... looks like you two. Used the direct affection." he said. He let out a laugh. "How ironic. Welcome aboard my vessal, the Falcon."

"You guys too." Lex said. ??? nodded. "So what's up with all this."

"Well. It all be-" but he was interuppted by a violent shaking. "Looks like we stalled too long. Ryan! Wake up!" he kneeled next to him. Ryan was still asleep. "Thunder!"

A thunder spell struck him. Ryan awoke with a start.

"To your station! Come on!" the guy said running out the door.

"Come on you too." Ryan said pulling Lex. Aki follow. They got to the front of the ship. "Strap yourselves in." Ryan said jumping into his seat.

"Ryan! Lower weapons energy by 50% Add that to the shields."

"Yes Captain Eddie." Ryan said as he began pushing buttons.

"So here you are. And i thought you got away." Aeris said.

"Falcon. Activate exterior sound system."
13411122221.title: healing Aki

choices: she places it back on the table
134111222211.content:
"Let me make this as simple I can. You have two choices. You can let us go. And nothing bad will happen. Or you can take it the hard where your safety is not assured." Eddie said.

"What can you possibly you do?" Aeris moving the ship around.

"Quit that! I swear you'll regret it." he said. Aeris just giggled. "As for your question. The answer is quite a lot."

"Hm.." she was think.

"Ryan. Fire the phase cannons. Shoot a Quantom Torpido." Eddie said to Ryan.

"Yes,sir." On the screen they could see the weapons fire. Aeris dropped the ship.

"Alright! Engines to max power." Lex and Aki felt the jolt from the ship as it shot forward. "Evasive program activate."

"Uhh. Sir?"

"What is it?"

"The left wing is damaged..." Ryan said.

"Hold on!!!" The ship made a violent veer to the left and spun out of control. "Manual."

A control appear in front of him. He grabbed it. Lex and Aki would be screaming but the force on their lungs made it impossible. The ship stop spining and crashed through a window. It landed on a table by skidding. Til it came to a stop.

"Sir! Shields down. Engine is damaged. Back up engines and weapons are offline." They heard a voice and erked

"What was that?"

"What are we going to do?" Lex said. Eddie sighed. He looked at them with a worried face.

"Pray to god that this person will help us." he said. They heard the footstep come into the room. The ship shook as it was picked up. The screen was filled up by the face of a beautiful young woman.

"What's this? A toy ship?" said the young woman as she observed the ship. She was turning it.

"Ryan? Is the extiror sound system okay?" Ryan nodded.

"Lady! This ain't a toy ship!!!" she was surprised and dropped it. Everyone yelled as the falling took place. When the ship hit the ground. Everyone, even the young woman, heard Eddie's cursing.

What does the woman do next?
134111222211.title: Damage can affect a lot

1342.content:
The light faded around them and they dropped for a bit
"Lex?! Whats going oooon?" Aki screamed as the plummeted down. Suddenly they splashed into a strange lake.
"Aki shh... can you hear that? Someone is humming..." Lex said
"Who Lex? Who is it" Aki questioned, just then they turned arounnd to see something they didn't excpect
"IS THAT TIFA LEX!?! TELL ME THAT ISN'T TIFA!" Aki screamed, they weren't in a lake they were in a jaquise with a giant full sized Tifa.
"Okay got the water ready~" She smiled and pushed a button and the water started bubbling, tossing Aki and Lex around.
"HOLD ON AKI" Lex yelled, Aki was bobbing up and down trying to stay afloat, suddenly they smacked into a big fleshy object.
"OW!" lex yelled, he looked around and grabbed Aki and kept the two afloat. They looked up, they had smacked into one of Tifa's giant breast and she had felt them "um... hi?" Aki said nervously, Tifa screamed.
After a short explanation Tifa fished them out of the water and onto her giant hand. Lex daydreamed for a moment of the possablitys but Aki shook him back to reality.
"um Tifa... what should we do?" Aki said nervously looking around.
"You know thats a good question" she thought to herself "I know! We can go see Cid... he might have at least a idea on what to do!" she got up and set the two on the counter dried off then got dressed. She scooped the two up and set them in her back pants pocket.
And so there adventure with Tifa begins.
1342.title: The bath of doom

some one forgot about 12

13522.title: real last choices

info.brief_description: Aki and Lex are shrunk to 2 inches tall in their favorite anime/video game!
info.description:
This story is based off the Video Game GTS story, Jainson, by Kronos_Recker. http://vggtsworld.ta-host.com/stories/ff/jainson.htm

Lex is a 24-year old British gaming designer and artist. Aki is a 20-year old Japanese college student, whose ambition is to become a programmer.

Both of them are good friends who loves video games and anime. But one day when Lex brings over an underground game modification device, their lives change forever. They are shrunk to a mere 2 inches tall and transported into a video game or anime, just like in the original Jainson incident.

Alright, this is a wide-open giantess story. Just about anything except for X-rated stuff is allowed. Do NOT insert extreme sexual content. No short chapters either.
